meaningMnemonic: The <radical>dirt</radical> under a <radical>cliff</radical> is going to be under a lot of <kanji>pressure</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The dirt being crushed under this <kanji>pressure</kanji> can't help but react by sneezing out, "<reading>Achoo</reading> (あつ)!" This sneeze-inducing pressure probably has something to do with where earthquakes come from.
